titles.title: Retirement Protection Act of 2022
Retirement Protection Act of 2022
To increase retirement savings, simplify and clarify retirement plan rules, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Retirement Protection Act of 2022
This bill temporarily increases the contribution limits for certain retirement accounts. It also modifies the tax credit for contributions to certain retirement accounts (i.e., the Saver's Credit).
